comments.body: I find it useful to have a comment or example for the use of things like `SplitN` to help others understand what is going on.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@		// everything else in parts[1] (even if there are multiple =
		// characters).
		parts := strings.SplitN(vk, "=", 2)
		key := parts[0]
		value := parts[1]
